description: Dashboard for API Management service. Monitors health, API, operations, and requests. Contains panels which utilize App Insights and Log Analytics (if enabled).

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ApiManagementGatewayLogs 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ApiId != ""
| extend Success = iff(IsRequestSuccess=="false", 0, 1)
| summarize RequestCount=count(CorrelationId), 
            AverageResponseTime=strcat(round(avg(TotalTime), 3), " ms"), 
            AverageResponseSize=strcat(round(avg(ResponseSize), 1), " B"),
            SuccessRate=strcat(round(avg(Success)*100, 3), "%") by ApiId

ApiManagementGatewayLogs 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where OperationId != ""
| extend Success = iff(IsRequestSuccess=="false", 0, 1)
| summarize RequestCount=count(CorrelationId), 
            AverageResponseTime=strcat(round(avg(TotalTime), 3), " ms"), 
            AverageResponseSize=strcat(round(avg(ResponseSize), 1), " B"),
            SuccessRate=strcat(round(avg(Success)*100, 3), "%") by OperationId

ApiManagementGatewayLogs 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where IsRequestSuccess == "true"
| project TimeGenerated, Method, URL=Url, ResponseCode, ServiceResponseCode=BackendResponseCode, 
          RequestSize=iff(RequestSize!="", strcat(RequestSize, " B"), "0 B"),
          ResponseSize=strcat(ResponseSize, " B"),
          ResponseTime=TotalTime, ServiceResponseTime=BackendTime, Cache, IPAddress=CallerIpAddress,
          ServiceRegion=Region, CorrelationId

AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| summarize RequestsCount=sum(ItemCount), AverageDuration=avg(DurationMs), percentiles(DurationMs, 50, 95, 99) by OperationName, _ResourceId
| order by RequestsCount desc

AppAvailabilityResults 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Success == false
| project TimeGenerated, Location, ClientType, ClientIP, ClientCity, ClientStateOrProvince, ClientCountryOrRegion

panels.title: Failed Requests by Cloud Role Name

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Success == false
| summarize failedCount=sum(ItemCount) by Name
| top 10 by failedCount desc

AppRequests
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) and Success == false
| join kind= inner (
AppExceptions
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
) on OperationId
| project ExceptionType = Type, FailedMethod = Method, RequestName = Name, RequestDuration = DurationMs

title: ${title}
